name: Ternoa
introduce: Ternoa is an open source infrastructure blockchain, dedicated to the creation of utility NFTs. Ternoa allows the creation of “secret” NFTs that enable the secure storage and transmission of data over time. And also NFTs that can be loaned, rented to third parties, or fractionalized to allow for shared ownership. Capsule Corp Labs’ mission is to help companies of all sizes develop their business model on the Ternoa blockchain.
